featured.text: Dr. Begall and her colleagues wanted to know whether larger mammals also have the ability to perceive magnetic fields.

definition.zh_def: 哺乳動物，具有毛髮並能夠產奶的動物。
definition.en_def: A warm-blooded vertebrate animal that has hair or fur and typically gives birth to live young and feeds them with milk.
definition.example: A dolphin is a type of mammal that lives in the ocean.
